testcase.classname: Search and place order for vegetables
testcase.name: Search for item and move to checkout page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on green cart landing page....................................passed When User searched for Brinjal vegetables...................................passed And Added item to cart......................................................passed And User proceeded to Checkout page for purchase............................passed Then Verify selected Brinjal item are displayed in Checkout page............passed
